body.description: Find your fresh with Summer's Eve Feminine Cleansing Wash. Summer's Eve Essential Botanicals Feminine Cleansing Wash is enhanced with orange essential oil and is hypoallergenic, and safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, Summer's Eve Feminine Cleansing Wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Made for sensitive skin, Summer's Eve Feminine Cleansing Wash won't dry like soap, and it's balanced to a woman's natural pH. All Summer's Eve products – along with every unique scent – are gynecologist-tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Essential Botanicals is enhanced with orange essential oil, green tea, lavender and rose botanical extracts. Summer's Eve Feminine Cleansing Wash and Cleansing Cloths are available in a variety of different fragrances and sizes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Micellar Water Formula 2 Clinically Tested 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Gentle Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Sensitive Skin Free from Parabens Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Sensitive Skin Free from Parabens

What is unique about Summer's Eve Gentle Collection? Our Gentle Collection caters to those with want extra gentle products with light to no fragrances. The products in this Collection include our Simply Sensitive and Fragrance Free lines and are designed to have the gentlest touch. Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fresh and gentle
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Summer's Eve Intimate Soap, and I must say it has become my go-to for a refreshing and gentle cleansing experience. What sets it apart is the naturally derived scent that leaves a subtle and pleasant aroma, ensuring a clean feeling without being overpowering.The formula is exceptionally gentle, and I appreciate that it doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped or dry. Instead, it provides a refreshing sensation that lasts, making it an ideal choice for daily use.As someone who values natural ingredients, I find comfort in knowing that the fragrance is derived naturally, adding a touch of botanical freshness to my routine. Summer's Eve Intimate Soap has exceeded my expectations, offering a balance between effective cleansing and a delicate, natural scent. If you're looking for a soap that leaves you feeling refreshed without any harsh effects, this is undoubtedly a fantastic choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Summer's Eve Botanical
reviews.reviewText: I've used SE products for years and this is as good as any I've used. Very gentle. The fragrance is extremely subtle. So much so that it may as well not have any at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Feminine Wash Ever
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a few different scents from this brand and I love all of them, I love the price also. It doesn’t sting or nothing. It lasts like 2 or 3 months for me. I would DEFINITELY recommend, just give it a try I assure that you never going to change your opinion on it.
